name: Is Your Daughter A Mutant? a twine poem by sunkern-plus
name_original: Is Your Daughter A Mutant? a twine poem by sunkern-plus
description: A short Twine poem showing the parallels between trans identity and mutants in the 1992 X-Men cartoon. I plan to upload more Twine games since that's the only medium of game development I'm really good at ;_;
